name: protractor-retry
description: module for protractor to automatically re-run failed tests with specific number of attempts

scripts.test: protractor test/protractor.mocha.conf.js;echo '######### MOCHA DONE ########';protractor test/protractor.jasmine.conf.js;echo '######### JASMINE DONE ########';DEBUG=ProtractorRetry protractor test/protractor.suite.conf.js --suite=mochasuite

author: Amro Tahtamouni
